extract_crowns_data

Source: vignettes/extract_crowns_data.Rmd
extract_crowns_data.Rmd
library(managecrownsdata)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
library(stringr)
library(sf)
#> Linking to GEOS 3.10.2, GDAL 3.4.1, PROJ 8.2.1; sf_use_s2() is TRUE
crownsFile <- sf::st_read(file.path(system.file(package="managecrownsdata"), '/crowns/crowns_test.gpkg'))
#> Reading layer `crowns_test' from data source 
#>   `/home/runner/work/_temp/Library/managecrownsdata/crowns/crowns_test.gpkg' 
#>   using driver `GPKG'
#> Simple feature collection with 14 features and 30 fields
#> Geometry type: POLYGON
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: 256873.9 ymin: 353656.7 xmax: 256946.1 ymax: 353753.1
#> Projected CRS: WGS 84 / UTM zone 33N
rgb_paths <- list.files(file.path(system.file(package="managecrownsdata"), 'rgb/'), full.names = TRUE)
dates <- paste(
   stringr::str_sub(stringr::str_split(basename(rgb_paths), '_', simplify = TRUE)[,2],1,4),
   stringr::str_sub(stringr::str_split(basename(rgb_paths), '_', simplify = TRUE)[,2],5,6),
   stringr::str_sub(stringr::str_split(basename(rgb_paths), '_', simplify = TRUE)[,2],7,8),
   sep = '_'
)
site = 'Bouamir'
crs <- 'EPSG:32633'

check_crownsFile(crownsFile = crownsFile)
#> ##########     VARIABLES CHECK     ##########
#> -                                           -
#> -- ERROR --  :   geometry variable missing or not well named
#> --- OK ----  :   id
#> -- ERROR --  :   family variable missing or not well named
#> -- ERROR --  :   genus variable missing or not well named
#> -- ERROR --  :   specie variable missing or not well named
#> --- OK ----  :   plot_name
#> -- ERROR --  :   code_sp variable missing or not well named
#> -                                           -
#> -                                           -
#> ##########           CRS           ##########
#> -                                           -
#> CRS : WGS 84 / UTM zone 33N
#> -                                           -
#> -                                           -
#> ##########   DUPLICATED ID CHECK   ##########
#> -                                           -
#> --- OK ----  :  There is no duplicated id

crownsFile <- crownsFile %>% dplyr::rename(geometry = geom,
                      family = tax_fam,
                      genus = tax_gen,
                      specie = tx_sp_lvl,
                      code_sp = idtax_f)

check_crownsFile(crownsFile = crownsFile)
#> ##########     VARIABLES CHECK     ##########
#> -                                           -
#> --- OK ----  :   geometry
#> --- OK ----  :   id
#> --- OK ----  :   family
#> --- OK ----  :   genus
#> --- OK ----  :   specie
#> --- OK ----  :   plot_name
#> --- OK ----  :   code_sp
#> -                                           -
#> -                                           -
#> ##########           CRS           ##########
#> -                                           -
#> CRS : WGS 84 / UTM zone 33N
#> -                                           -
#> -                                           -
#> ##########   DUPLICATED ID CHECK   ##########
#> -                                           -
#> --- OK ----  :  There is no duplicated id
